Hello Past-Exonauts,


You are cordially invited to our annual AWS Re:Invent party co-hosted by Pivotal, Filepicker, and Storm Ventures.


Now in its 3rd year, this exclusive event has reached legendary status with its unbeatable penthouse location, Insta-friendly logo ice sculptures, quality food and drinks, and killer vibes from DJ Forty Fivan (who also happens to the the Iron.io BD guy).


Location: Provided by SMS on the day of the event. You'll submit your number on registration.

Date: Wednesday, Oct 7th, 2015. 7:30PM - Midnight

Dress: Smart


Register here to get on the secret guest list


Your friends at Iron, Pivotal, Filepicker and Storm Ventures.

If no longer want to receive communications about the Exosphere you can unsubscribe.


Exosphere is a co-hosted event by Filepicker,Iron.io,StormVentures and Pivotal.

A hand crafted event by a motley crew of developers, designers, events people and founders.
